(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD had)
      (NP (DT the) (NN opportunity)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB meet)
              (PRT (RP up))
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP
                  (NP (NNP Chef) (NNP Vincent) (NNP Theong))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP
                      (NP (NNP Orchard) (NNP Cafe))
                      (SBAR
                        (WHNP (WP who))
                        (S
                          (VP (VBD gave)
                            (NP (PRP me))
                            (NP
                              (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (NNS pointers))
                              (PP (IN on)
                                (SBAR
                                  (WHADVP (WRB how))
                                  (S
                                    (VP (TO to)
                                      (VP (VB fry)
                                        (NP (NN rice))
                                        (SBAR (RB so) (IN that)
                                          (S
                                            (NP (PRP you))
                                            (VP (VBP have)
                                              (NP (DT that) (NNP Wok) (NNP Hei) (NN fragrance)))))))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(had-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, had-2)
det(opportunity-4, the-3)
dobj(had-2, opportunity-4)
aux(meet-6, to-5)
infmod(opportunity-4, meet-6)
prt(meet-6, up-7)
prep(meet-6, with-8)
nn(Theong-11, Chef-9)
nn(Theong-11, Vincent-10)
pobj(with-8, Theong-11)
prep(Theong-11, of-12)
nn(Cafe-14, Orchard-13)
pobj(of-12, Cafe-14)
nsubj(gave-16, who-15)
rcmod(Cafe-14, gave-16)
iobj(gave-16, me-17)
det(pointers-20, a-18)
amod(pointers-20, few-19)
dobj(gave-16, pointers-20)
prep(pointers-20, on-21)
advmod(fry-24, how-22)
aux(fry-24, to-23)
pcomp(on-21, fry-24)
dobj(fry-24, rice-25)
advmod(have-29, so-26)
mark(have-29, that-27)
nsubj(have-29, you-28)
advcl(fry-24, have-29)
det(fragrance-33, that-30)
nn(fragrance-33, Wok-31)
nn(fragrance-33, Hei-32)

          (NP (JJS most) (NNS people))

            (VP (VB have)
              (NP (PDT such) (DT a) (JJ big) (NN fire))
              (PP (IN at)
                (NP (NN home))))))))
    (, ,)))

    (NP

        (S
          (NP (PRP he))

            (PP (IN about)
              (S
                (VP (VBG frying)
                  (NP (NN rice)))))))))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (ADVP (RB still))
      (ADJP (RB very) (JJ helpful)))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN reason))

          (VP (VBG using)
            (VP (VBN cooled)
              (PRT (RP down))
              (NP (NN rice)))))))

      (SBAR (RB so) (IN that)

                      (VP (VBG getting)
                        (NP (DT all)))))
                  (VP (VBD mushed)
                    (PRT (RP up))))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT the) (NN starch) (NNS chains))
      (VP (VB reorganize)
        (NP (PRP themselves))
        (PP (IN into)
          (NP
            (NP (DT a)
              (ADJP (RBR more) (JJ complex))
              (NN network))
            (VP (VBG resulting)
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT a) (NN rice) (NN grain))
                  (SBAR
                    (WHNP (WDT that))
                    (S
                      (VP (VBZ is)
                        (ADJP
                          (ADJP (JJR firmer))
                          (PP (IN than)
                            (SBAR
                              (WHADVP (WRB when))
                              (S
                                (NP (PRP it))
                                (VP (VBZ is)
                                  (ADVP (RB first))
                                  (VP (VBN cooked)))))))))))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (DT this))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADJP (JJ ideal)
          (PP (IN for)
            (S
              (VP (VBG frying)

                  (S
                    (NP (PRP you))
                    (VP (VBP want)

                        (VP (TO to)

    (. .)))
